pkgmetadata.longdescription: R6-Based ML Survival Learners for 'mlexperiments' // Enhances 'mlexperiments' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=mlexperiments with additional machine learning ('ML') learners for survival analysis. The package provides R6-based survival learners for the following algorithms: 'glmnet' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=glmnet, 'ranger' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=ranger, 'xgboost' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=xgboost, and 'rpart' https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=rpart. These can be used directly with the 'mlexperiments' R package.
